addComment.description: Add a comment (internal note) to a conversation in Front.

props.name: body
props.description: The content of the comment.

addContactHandle.description: Add a handle (email, phone number, etc.) to an existing Contact.

props.name: handle_type
props.description: Type of handle to add.

props.name: handle_value
props.description: The value of the handle (e.g., email address, phone number).

addConversationLinks.description: Link external references (URLs) to a conversation.

addConversationTags.description: Add one or more tags to a conversation.

assignUnassignConversation.description: Assign a conversation to a teammate or remove assignment.

createAccount.description: Create a new account in Front.

props.name: name
props.description: The name of the account to create.

props.name: description
props.description: A description for the account.

props.name: domains
props.description: List of domains associated with the account.

props.name: domain
props.description: A domain associated with the account.

props.name: external_id
props.description: An external identifier for the account.

props.name: custom_fields
props.description: Custom fields for this account, as a JSON object.

createContact.description: Create a new contact in Front.

props.name: name
props.description: The name of the contact.

props.name: description
props.description: A description for the contact.

props.name: handles
props.description: List of contact handles (e.g., email, phone).

props.name: handle
props.description: The value of the handle (e.g., email address).

props.name: source
props.description: Type of handle to add.

props.name: avatar_url
props.description: URL of the contact’s avatar image.

props.name: links
props.description: List of URLs associated with the contact.

props.name: group_names
props.description: List of group names to associate with the contact.

props.name: list_names
props.description: List of contact list names this contact belongs to. Front will create any that do not exist.

props.name: custom_fields
props.description: Custom fields for this contact, as a JSON object (e.g., {"CRM ID": "12345"}).

createDraftReply.description: Create a draft reply to an existing conversation (subject/quote etc.) without sending immediately.

props.name: body
props.description: The content of the draft reply.

props.name: subject
props.description: The subject of the draft reply (for email channels).

props.name: to
props.description: List of recipient handles (email addresses, etc.).

props.name: cc
props.description: List of CC recipient handles.

props.name: bcc
props.description: List of BCC recipient handles.

props.name: attachments
props.description: List of attachment URLs.

props.name: mode
props.description: Mode of the draft reply

props.name: signature_id
props.description: The ID of the signature to use for the draft reply (if applicable).

props.name: should_add_default_signature
props.description: Whether to append the default signature to the draft reply (if applicable).

createDraft.description: Create a draft message in Front.

props.name: to
props.description: List of recipient handles (email addresses, etc.).

props.name: cc
props.description: List of CC recipient handles.

props.name: bcc
props.description: List of BCC recipient handles.

props.name: subject
props.description: The subject of the draft.

props.name: body
props.description: The body of the draft message.

props.name: attachments
props.description: List of attachment URLs.

props.name: mode
props.description: Mode of the draft reply

props.name: signature_id
props.description: The ID of the signature to use for the draft reply (if applicable).

props.name: should_add_default_signature
props.description: Whether to append the default signature to the draft reply (if applicable).

createLink.description: Create a Link in Front (name, external URL).

props.name: name
props.description: The name of the link.

props.name: external_url
props.description: The external URL for the link.

props.name: pattern
props.description: Optional pattern to match URLs (regex).

findAccount.description: List company accounts and optionally filter by email domain or external ID.

props.name: email_domain
props.description: Filter accounts by email domain

props.name: external_id
props.description: Filter accounts by external ID

props.name: limit
props.description: Maximum number of accounts to return (max 100).

props.name: page_token
props.description: Token for pagination.

props.name: sort_by
props.description: Field used to sort the accounts.

props.name: sort_order
props.description: Order by which results should be sorted.

findContact.description: Look up a contact by handle (email, phone, etc.) or other identifying field.

props.name: email
props.description: Email address to search for.

props.name: phone
props.description: Phone number to search for.

props.name: custom_query
props.description: Custom Front query string (advanced).

props.name: limit
props.description: Maximum number of contacts to return.

props.name: page_token
props.description: Token for pagination.

findConversation.description: Find a conversation by search filters such as subject, participants, tags, inbox, etc.

props.name: q
props.description: Front query string (e.g. subject:"Order", tag_ids:tag_123, inbox_id:inb_456, etc.). See https://dev.frontapp.com/docs/search-1

props.name: limit
props.description: Maximum number of conversations to return.

props.name: page_token
props.description: Token for pagination.

removeContactHandle.description: Remove a handle (email, phone number, etc.) from an existing Contact.

props.name: handle
props.description: The handle to remove.

props.name: source
props.description: The type of the handle to remove.

props.name: force
props.description: If true, the entire contact will be deleted if this is their last handle.

removeConversationLinks.description: Remove external links from a conversation in Front.

props.name: links
props.description: List of external URLs to remove from the conversation.

removeConversationTags.description: Remove one or more tags from a conversation.

props.name: tag_ids
props.description: List of tag IDs to remove from the conversation.

sendMessage.description: Send a new message (starts a conversation) with subject, recipients, body, attachments, tags, etc.

props.name: to
props.description: List of recipient handles (email addresses, etc.).

props.name: cc
props.description: List of CC recipient handles.

props.name: bcc
props.description: List of BCC recipient handles.

props.name: subject
props.description: The subject of the message.

props.name: body
props.description: The body of the message.

props.name: attachments
props.description: List of attachment URLs.

sendReply.description: Send a reply to a conversation in Front.

props.name: body
props.description: The content of the reply message.

props.name: subject
props.description: The subject of the reply (for email channels).

props.name: to
props.description: List of recipient handles (email addresses, etc.).

props.name: cc
props.description: List of CC recipient handles.

props.name: bcc
props.description: List of BCC recipient handles.

props.name: attachments
props.description: List of attachment URLs.

updateAccount.description: Update an existing account in Front.

props.name: name
props.description: The new name for the account.

props.name: description
props.description: The new description for the account.

props.name: domains
props.description: List of domains associated with the account.

props.name: custom_fields
props.description: Custom fields to add or update. Existing fields will be preserved.

updateContact.description: Update an existing contact in Front.

props.name: name
props.description: The new name for the contact.

props.name: description
props.description: A new description for the contact.

props.name: avatar_url
props.description: URL of the contact’s avatar image.

props.name: links
props.description: List of URLs associated with the contact.

updateConversation.description: Modify conversation properties: status, assignee, inbox, tags, etc.

props.name: status
props.description: The new status for the conversation.

updateLink.description: Update the name or external URL of a Link in Front.

props.name: name
props.description: The new name for the link.

props.name: external_url
props.description: The new external URL for the link.

newComment.description: Fires when a new comment is posted on a conversation in Front.

newConversationStateChange.description: The state to trigger on (e.g., open, archived, deleted, assigned, etc.).

props.name: desired_state
props.description: The state to trigger on (e.g., open, archived, deleted, assigned, etc.).

newInboundMessage.description: The ID of the inbox to monitor for new inbound messages.

props.name: inbox_id
props.description: The ID of the inbox to monitor for new inbound messages.

newOutboundMessage.description: The ID of the inbox to monitor for new inbound messages.

props.name: inbox_id
props.description: The ID of the inbox to monitor for new inbound messages.

newTagAddedToMessage.description: Fires when a tag is applied to a conversation.
